name: Engine of Calamity
description:
In Engine of Calamity, you must outrun the Calamity. It will constantly chase you through the levels. As you take damage from the obstacles or enemies that come from the Calamity, the Calamity will inch closer to you. 

If you manage to successfully outrun the Calamity, you'll be presented a few options to upgrade your ship and how you want to deal with survivors. You only have a finite amount of space and need to decide if you want to bring more survivors at the cost of upgrades or leave them behind to their own fate.

Use WASD to move, Left Mouse Button to shoot.
